orderedElements.name: formatcode
orderedElements.m_sValue:
<!---------------------------------+
| Flexcontainer w/ handlebars     
| content ID: {{ contentId }}     
| version: {{ contentVersion }}
| pubdate: {{publishDate}}
| pageURL: {{ pageURL }}
| URL: {{ publishURL }}
| preview: {{ previewURL }}
+---------------------------------->

<div id="flexContainer-{{ contentId }}" class="flex-container">

<!-- 1/2 -->
  
  <style>
  .flex-container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: stretch;
    place-content: {{#each (selected element="ct_alignContent")}}{{value}}{{/each}};
    justify-content: {{#each (selected element="ct_justifyContent")}}{{value}}{{/each}};
    align-items: {{#each (selected element="ct_alignItems")}}{{value}}{{/each}};
    flex-flow: {{#each (selected element="ct_flexDirection")}}{{value}}{{/each}} {{#each (selected element="ct_flexWrap")}}{{value}}{{/each}};
    gap: {{ publish element="ct_gap" }}px;
    row-gap: {{ publish element="ct_rowGap" }}px;
    column-gap: {{ publish element="ct_columnGap" }}px;
    padding: {{ publish element="ct_padding" }}px;
    border-width: {{ publish element="ct_borderWidth" }}px;
    border-color: {{ publish element="ct_borderColor" }};
    background-color: {{ publish element="ct_backgroundColor" }};
    width: {{ publish element="ct_width" }}%;
  }

  .flex-item {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    flex: 1 1 0%;
    min-height: 300px;
    background-color: #f8f9fa;
    border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
    padding: 20px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  }

  .flex-item-content {
    flex-grow: 1;
  }

  .flex-item-footer {
    margin-top: auto;
  }

  .flex-item .icon {
    font-size: 55px;
    color: #0a8a0a;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }

  .flex-item h3 {
    font-size: 2rem !important;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }

  .flex-item p {
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }

  .flex-item a {
    color: #0a8a0a;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: bold;
  }

  .flex-item a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
</style>
